project.name: Arcade Machine
project.summary: Fully functioning old school arcade machine redone using modern technology, custom built with two 8-button joysticks, no-keyboard front end operation and retrofitted working coin door.

project.name: Christmas Tree
project.summary: Christmas Tree controller via smartphone. Can be turned on/off from anywhere in the world, and runs on a schedule that can be overwritten for specific timeframe or until next programmed change.

project.name: 3d printed holder
project.summary: 3D printed phone adapter to be used with a new phone that was too wide to be used with the old holder. Designed in SketchUp, printed on MakerBot v2.
